Information
Date Time Manager

Handles time conversions, timers and timer events.

hhmmss
hhmmss

Handles Time formats.

Functions
_init
func _init(
time: float
)

Stores parameters hours, minutes and seconds.

Parameters
hh

Hours

mm

Minutes

ss

Seconds

calc_time
func calc_time(
time: float
)

Calculates hours, minutes and seconds from an absolute time formatted in seconds.

Parameters
time
float

time in seconds

Returns
[hh, mm, ss]

array with variables hours, minutes, seconds (all integers)
